references.paper_title: Diffusion forcing: Next-token prediction meets full-sequence diffusion.
references.reason: This paper introduces Diffusion Forcing (DF), a key technique used in the main paper for autoregressive generation, enabling extended temporal simulation.
The paper's diffusion transformer (DiT) architecture serves as the baseline video generation model, which the paper is built upon.
This paper introduces the attention mechanism, which is used in the paper to guide information exchange between the denoising frames and the memory frames.

references.paper_title: Stereo magnification: Learning view synthesis using multiplane images.
references.reason: The paper uses RealEstate10K datasets to design trajectories that incorporate past scenes to evaluate long-term world consistency

references.paper_title: Minedojo: Building open-ended embodied agents with internet-scale knowledge.
references.reason: The paper uses MineDojo dataset to create diverse training and evaluation datasets in Minecraft, configuring diverse environments.
